title: Kyle Sandilands reveals what he REALLY thought of his longtime co-host Jackie 'O' Henderson
text:
He's made a lucrative career for himself with his crude comments, and now Kyle Sandilands is revealing what he really thinks of his radio co-host, Jackie 'O' Henderson.

Appearing at the Radio Alive conference in Brisbane on Friday, the 48-year-old shock jock revealed what his first impression was of his 44-year-old longtime collaborator.

'I thought she was f***able,' he said simply, as reported by The Daily Telegraph.

Thoughts: Kyle Sandilands (pictured) revealed when he really thinks of his radio co-host, Jackie 'O' Henderson, describing her as 'f***able'

Speaking exclusively to the newspaper later on, Kyle confessed he still found his co-host to be very attractive.

'She is f***able… was and is,' he clarified.

He also downplayed his remarkable pay increase, after it was revealed on Thursday that he had signed a new deal with KIIS FM that could earn him up to $8 million a year.

First impressions: The 48-year-old shock jock revealed what his first impression was of his 44-year-old longtime collaborator. 'I thought she was f***able,' he said simply

'The contract was already extremely healthy and I was happy with it. I was more than happy to re-sign but with a few extra changes and a bit of a back pocket filler,' he added.

'Yes, it is a remarkable amount of money, but we were already getting paid a s***load of money before.'

But his pay increase doesn't appear to be sitting well with everyone, with former Today show host Karl Stefanovic lambasting Kyle at the event.

Crush: Speaking exclusively to The Daily Telegraph, Kyle confessed he still found his co-host to be very attractive

'In this new media landscape, I can't believe you're still on the radio,' Karl, 45, told Kyle at the Radio Alive conference, as reported by News.com.au.

'I think the whole world has gone absolutely crazy.'

He then added: 'I got divorced and sacked, and you offend two of the world's great religions and get $8 million!'
description: He's made a lucrative career for himself with his crude comments, and now Kyle Sandilands is revealing what he really thinks of his radio co-host, Jackie 'O' Henderson.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
